name: Amplify Online Retail ETF
description: The Amplify Online Retail ETF (IBUY) is an innovative exchange-traded fund that focuses on companies engaged in the online retail sector. Launched in 2016, IBUY seeks to provide investors with exposure to a diverse range of businesses that derive a significant portion of their revenues from online sales. The ETF holds a portfolio of companies involved in e-commerce, direct-to-consumer sales, and other digital retail platforms, reflecting the growing trend of consumers increasingly shifting their purchasing habits from traditional brick-and-mortar stores to online platforms. IBUY includes a mix of established giants in the online retail space, as well as emerging players in the industry, thus providing a comprehensive view of the e-commerce landscape. The fund aims to capitalize on the growth potential of the online retail market, which has seen accelerated adoption due to technological advancements and changing consumer behaviors. Amplify ETFs, the issuer of IBUY, is committed to offering investment products that are transparent, accessible, and easy to understand, enhancing the investor experience in the rapidly evolving market of online shopping.

seo.meta_title: Amplify Online Retail ETF (IBUY) | Invest in E-Commerce
seo.meta_description: Explore the Amplify Online Retail ETF (IBUY), which invests in companies focused on the online retail sector. Discover the growth potential of e-commerce.

faq.question: What is IBUY?
faq.answer: IBUY is the Amplify Online Retail ETF, focusing on companies that generate significant revenue from online retail.

faq.question: Who manages IBUY?
faq.answer: IBUY is managed by Amplify ETFs, led by CEO Christian Magoon.

faq.question: What types of companies does IBUY invest in?
faq.answer: IBUY invests in e-commerce companies and online retail platforms, including both established and emerging brands.
